TheSecretHistories:Lantern.NAME: Lantern
DESCRIPTIONS: Lantern is the principle of the secret place sometimes called the House of the Sun, and of the light above it.

TheSecretHistories:Forge.NAME: Forge
DESCRIPTIONS: The principle of the Forge transforms and destroys.

TheSecretHistories:Edge.NAME: 刃
DESCRIPTIONS: [Edge is the principle of battle and of struggle.

TheSecretHistories:Winter.NAME: Winter
DESCRIPTIONS: Winter is the principle of silence, of endings, and of those things that are not quite dead.[at the end of turn,take %d damage.]

TheSecretHistories:Heart.NAME: Heart
DESCRIPTIONS: The Heart is the principle that continues and preserves.

TheSecretHistories:Grail.NAME: Grail
DESCRIPTIONS: The principle of the Grail honours both the birth and the feast.

TheSecretHistories:Moth.NAME: Moth
DESCRIPTIONS: Moth is the wild and perilous principle of chaos and yearning.[Stackable,but lose all moth at the end of turn.]

TheSecretHistories:Knock.NAME: Knock
DESCRIPTIONS: The Knock is the principle that opens doors and unseams barriers.

TheSecretHistories:SecretHistories.NAME: SecretHistories
DESCRIPTIONS: Secret Histories describe the unknown complexities of the world, and its many pasts.
Loot %d additional Gold.
Loot %d additional Cards.
Loot %d additional Relics.

TheSecretHistories:ToolLanternFPower.NAME: Watchman's Glass
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, for every %d Lantern you have, draw 1 card。

TheSecretHistories:ToolForgeBPower.NAME: Cinnabar Amulet
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have at least %d Forge, you can play status cards and Exhaust them.

TheSecretHistories:ToolEdgeDPower.NAME: Biedde's Blade
DESCRIPTIONS: at the end of turn, Lose Block equal to your tsh:Edge.

TheSecretHistories:ToolWinterDPower.NAME: Elagabaline Manacle
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain %d Winter at the end of turn.

TheSecretHistories:ToolWinterFPower.NAME: Division Bell
DESCRIPTIONS: Evey turn you gain Block equal to Winter of your enemies.

TheSecretHistories:ToolGrailDPower.NAME: Hallowed Polos
DESCRIPTIONS: Unable to gain block.

TheSecretHistories:ToolMothDPower.NAME: Dappled Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain Moth,you gain additional %d Moth.

TheSecretHistories:ToolKnockFPower.NAME: Frangiclave
DESCRIPTIONS: Entering Mansus no longer Exhausts Principles.

TheSecretHistories:ToolSecretHistoriesBP.NAME: Paradoxical Curio
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain additional %d card rewards.

TheSecretHistories:ToolSecretHistoriesDP.NAME: Atlas of Dreams
DESCRIPTIONS: Secret histories you gain from mansus are upgraded %d times.

TheSecretHistories:IngredientLanternDPow.NAME: Glassfinger Toxin
DESCRIPTIONS: this turn every time you play an attack card you draw !M! cards.

TheSecretHistories:IngredientLanternFPow.NAME: Ichor Vitreous
DESCRIPTIONS: There is no limit to the number of cards in hand.

TheSecretHistories:IngredientGrailDPower.NAME: amaranthine
DESCRIPTIONS: 20%% damage reduction,up to 100%%

TheSecretHistories:IngredientMothFPower.NAME: Reusing
DESCRIPTIONS: 使工具/原料额外打出1次

TheSecretHistories:FollowerKnockNPower.NAME: 内维尔
DESCRIPTIONS: 从漫宿中获得牌时，造成 %d 点伤害。

TheSecretHistories:DreadPower.NAME: Dread
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合临时失去1点力量

TheSecretHistories:FascinationPower.NAME: Fascination
DESCRIPTIONS: 每回合临时失去1点敏捷

TheSecretHistories:GainDexterityPower.NAME: Obtain Dexterity
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合结束时，获得 %d 点敏捷。

TheSecretHistories:LoseAllAlignmentNextT.NAME: 失去
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合结束时所有准则失去 %d 层

TheSecretHistories:IngredientEdgeDPower.NAME: 狻猊颗粒
DESCRIPTIONS: 本回合每打出攻击牌获得 %d 层刃

TheSecretHistories:SpiritGrailEEdgePower.NAME: 原生先知
DESCRIPTIONS: 受到50%%乘 %d 倍伤害

TheSecretHistories:IngredientWinterBPowe.NAME: 灰晓之油
DESCRIPTIONS: %d 回合不受到冬的伤害

TheSecretHistories:FollowerMothYPower.NAME: 伊莎贝特
DESCRIPTIONS: 获得蛾时，对所有敌人造成 %d 点伤害。

TheSecretHistories:GainEnergyAtStartOnTu.NAME: Additional energy
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain %d energy.
